alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:49PM EDT until July 26 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Richland County in north central Ohio... Central Ashland County in north central Ohio... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ontario, or near Mansfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Shelby, Ontario, Hayesville, Savannah, Jeromesville, Bailey Lakes, Mifflin, Nova, Nankin, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
